cvc-info: आपको  अपने क्रेडिट कार्ड के पीछे अपने तीन अंकों का सीवीसी नंबर मिल सकता है
email-info: We’ll email you a receipt for your donation. We won’t send you other email without your permission.
pp-acknowledge: इस फार्म जमा करने के लिए आपको  हमारी गोपनीयता नीति के साथ सहमत होना होगा
privacy-policy: I’m okay with you handling this info as you explain in your privacy policy
please-complete: ओह, कृप्या लाल रंग के  प्रकाश वाले स्थानों  को पूरा करें
problems-donating: Problems donating? Visit our FAQ for answers to most common questions. Still have problems? Send us an email.
contributions: Contributions go to the Mozilla Foundation, a 501(c)(3) organization, to be used in its discretion for its charitable purposes. They are tax-deductible in the U.S. to the fullest extent permitted by law.
